jd: From: Suraj Prashar, Pivotal Technologies suraj.prashar@pivotal-technologies.com Reply to: suraj.prashar@pivotal-technologies.com Hi, Hope you are doing great!!Please find the requirement below, If you find yourself comfortable with the requirement please reply back with your updated resume andI will get back to you or I would really appreciate if you can give me a call back at my contact number (703) 570-8775 * (Ext. 232). Job Title: HRIS BA ANALYSTLocation: Princeton, NJ (Hybrid) Local OnlyDuration: 6+ MonthsInterview: VideoVisa Type: No H1/OPT/CPT Local Only Job Description:HRIS Analyst IIIThe HRIS Workday Consultant tasks include:- Provides senior level support and advice for business end-user inquiries connected to Workday operations.- Deep understanding of Workday modules.- Lead various initiatives including M&A, ORG redesign, and Process Redesign.- Daily/Weekly reporting/status updates of all assigned projects.- Collaborate with Program Leads and other cross-functional teams on user challenges, issues, process enhancements, etc.- Provide system/process recommendations based on knowledge of Otsuka processes/technology.- Support as requested initiatives connected to developing user procedures, guidelines, and documentations.- Actively participates in user acceptance testing and documentation as requested.Qualifications/Experience:- 5 to 10 years’ experience with Workday HCM, and Recruiting- Workday HCM Certification is a Plus- Workday Recruiting Certification is a Plus- Experience with Workday advanced compensation and other modules is a Plus
